title: Your Facebook is probably segregated
text:
I   Technology Industry News.Net publishes news releases for the technology industry every single day. Internet   Intex to set up Rs 1000cr facility in UP Times Of India 
NEW DELHI: Domestic mobile phone maker Intex will invest Rs 1,000 crore to set up a manufacturing facility at Greater Noida in Uttar Pradesh as it looks to end dependence on imports to meet its ...
